Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 创建让用户能够调用 ASP.NET 事件处理程序的用户界面元素，并提供将用户输入从 UI 元素回发到服务器的方法。

span.span: Creates a user interface element that enables users to invoke ASP.NET event handlers and it provides a means to post user input from UI elements back to the server.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将显示为请求的设备上的交互式 UI 元素。The control displays as an interactive UI element on the requesting device. UI 元素的标签来自属性，它继承自基类。The label of the UI element comes from the property, which is inherited from the base class. > [!CAUTION] > 避免在 ASP.NET 移动网页 Url 中使用特殊字符。Avoid using special characters in ASP.NET mobile Web page URLs. 为发布生成的 HREF 标记`Command`回发到服务器的事件不会严格验证。The HREF tags generated for posting `Command` events back to the server are not strictly validated. 例如，包含空格的 URL 会导致无法处理的某些 WML 浏览器的 WML 生成。For example, a URL that includes spaces results in the generation of WML that cannot be handled by some WML browsers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将附加命令事件。The following code example demonstrates how to attach command events. 单击任一按钮将引发事件。Clicking either of the buttons raises the event. 用户定义函数使用`CommandEventArgs`参数，以查看哪些所单击的按钮。The user-defined function uses the `CommandEventArgs` argument to see which button was clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCommandExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCommandExample/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCommandExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCommandExample/VB/default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要在窗体上进行的验证，必须使用的控件引发验证，并且必须提交窗体及其属性设置为`true`。For validation to occur on a form, the form must be submitted with a control that raises validation, and must have its property set to `true`. 控件当前是唯一的控件引发验证。The control is currently the only control that raises validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当激活控件，它将引发事件。When a control is activated, it raises the event. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"特定于设备的呈现"和"特定于设备的行为"部分。For more information, see the "Device-Specific Rendering" and "Device-Specific Behavior" sections in . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将附加命令事件。The following code example demonstrates how to attach command events. 单击任一按钮将引发事件。Clicking either of the buttons raises the event. 用户定义函数使用`CommandEventArgs`参数，以查看哪些所单击的按钮。The user-defined function uses the `CommandEventArgs` argument to see which button was clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问通过两个可用的类型枚举。Access the two available types through the enumeration. （默认值） (default) 该命令将以按钮形式呈现。The command is rendered as a button. 该命令将呈现为链接。The command is rendered as a link. > [!NOTE] > 属性支持仅在由支持 JavaScript 的设备上的值属性。The property supports the value only on devices that support JavaScript as indicated by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性将命令呈现为链接或按钮。The following example demonstrates how to the use the property to render the command as a link or a button. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). span.span: if the control submits the form; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移动控件，如，可以重写此方法以确定这是否是用于提交窗体的控件。Mobile controls, such as the , can override this method to determine whether this is a control used for form submission. 其他控件可以通过提供以编程方式确定在必须将提交控件，例如，通过检查特定属性的逻辑扩展。Other controls can be extended by providing logic to programmatically determine whether or not they must be submit controls, for example, by checking for specific properties. > [!NOTE] > 一个控件被视为可某个控件，仅当它实现了捕获回发事件的方法。A control is considered to be a form-submit control only if it implements method to capture the postback event. 否则，它未注册的默认事件处理程序，即使该方法将返回`true`。Otherwise, it is not registered for the default event handler, even if the method returns `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当定义事件处理程序，则控件通知处理程序时通过用户交互生成的项事件。When an event handler is defined, the control notifies the handler when an item event is generated through user interaction. 与不同事件，事件冒泡到父控件。Unlike the event, the event is bubbled up to the parent controls. 事件呈现为特定于设备的和的"特定于设备的行为"部分中详细介绍了。The event rendering is device-specific and is discussed in detail in the "Device-Specific Behavior" section of . 后引发事件。The event is raised after an event. 在方案中，则重复同一组操作每次单击命令按钮时，可以使用或属性的单击的控件来标识的命令按钮的用户。In a scenario where you repeat the same set of actions each time a command button is clicked, you can use either the or property of the control to identify which command button the user clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用页面上的多个命令的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event for multiple commands on a page. summary.span: 设置或返回显示软键时使用的标签。

span.span: Sets or returns the label used when a softkey is displayed.

summary.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

value.span: 显示软键时使用的标签。

span.span: The label used when a soft key is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅用于支持软键的设备。This property is used only for devices that support softkeys. 如果此属性为空，使用控件的属性。If this property is empty, the property of the control is used. 如果属性为空或其长度小于 9，属性用于软键标签。If the property is empty or its length is less than 9, the property is used for the softkey label. 否则为 word`Go`显示 （如果它是一个提交管理命令）。Otherwise, the word `Go` (if it is a submit control command) is displayed. 值属性将被截断为 12 个字符 （的标准最大长度为软键）。The value of the property is truncated to 12 characters (the standard maximum length of a softkey).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在内部使用控制其单击时引发事件。The method is used internally by the control when it is clicked to raise a event.
